title: Tasty Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe
content:
Delicious chicken noodles made with a touch of sesame flavor. It tastes so delicious and is so fast to make as well.

 

Sesame Chicken Noodles Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Chinese

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Egg Noodles - 1 packet

Oil - 3 tablespoons

Onion - 1 large sliced

Soy sauce to taste

Vinegar to taste

Sugar to taste

Salt to taste

Spring Onion - a handful chopped finely

Sesame Seeds as needed

 

FOR MARINATION:

Chicken - 300 grams boneless

Ginger garlic paste - 1 tablespoon

Soy Sauce - 2 teaspoon

Black pepper powder - 1 teaspoon

Cornflour - 2 tablespoon

Salt to taste

 

Instructions

Cook noodles as per packet instructions. Drain and set aside.

Take chicken in a bowl, add all ingredients and mix well. Set aside.

Heat oil in a pan. Add in onions and fry for a min.

Add in chicken and cook till golden.

Add in noodles, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, and salt. Mix well.

Stir fry for few mins.

Add in spring onion. Mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe
recommendations.content:
Thai Sausage Fried Rice Recipe is one of the easiest and tastiest recipes you could ever make with leftover rice.  You are definitely going to love my schezwan fried rice.
Fried rice is not only delicious to eat but it makes a perfect lunch box recipe too.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
